price: 17. Boye, oyo akelaka azali lokola oyo akelaka te? Boye bozali kokanisa te?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
